body_html: Luckily, the tests relevant for this PR worked for me. I extended some of them to test through all supported types. This required to change some test cases since 128 can not be represented as int8. Is there a way to make a custom error message for assertAllClose? It would be nice to know in these test for which resize algorithm/type they failed.

body: Luckily, the tests relevant for this PR worked for me. I extended some of them to test through all supported types. This required to change some test cases since 128 can not be represented as int8. Is there a way to make a custom error message for `assertAllClose`? It would be nice to know in these test for which resize algorithm/type they failed.
